2082840.name: Jasper and the City of Lights
2082840.description:
On summer vacation Jasper and Nora were separated, when one of them carelessly decided to enter the forbidden forest in front of their grandparents farm all alone.

Jasper, Nora's young brother, gathers courage when he sees a star falling out of the night sky and takes on the quest to find and bring back his beloved sister and reunite the family.

Features

Survive the Cold!

Something is going on in the depth of the old forest in front of grandma Sophies farm: Snow and ice, in the middle of summer?

Don't venture too deep into the icy cold of the whispering forest or you will join the freezing souls of Myr!

Bring the World to Life!

A shooting star crashes inside the very forest where Jasper's big sister is thought to be missing. Where will it guide Jasper?

Light up candles and lanterns and experience the forest coming back to life!

Complete your Collection!

Document the mystical nature of the forest and its inhabitants and present your findings at the Library of Myr.

Find Nora’s treasures and other collectables and showcase them back at the Narrator’s home.

Collect Soul Dust to strengthen Jasper's fallen star and increase your power!

Make Friends!

At first glance only the whispering masks live within the shadows of the woods.

But wait, is that light in the distance? The deeper you go, the more you will learn about a civilization that only a few people ever got to tell stories about.

Reveal the Mystery!

Ice and snow in the middle of the summer. The stars are falling out of the sky. Whispering masks lurk in the shadows. The lights of a city on the horizon. And a name that makes the people of Myr shudder: Svangur

Stay Warm <3

Many cozy features are coming to Jasper. This is a game that can be explored in your own pace. We do try to invite you to stay for a while and enjoy the atmosphere. Wholesome features that are planned for the future include:

  • Jasper’s analog camera

  • A library that you can upgrade and fill with knowledge

  • Fishing

  • (Soul flower gardening?)

  • (Just sitting down near a warm candle and taking a break from the long journey?)

  • ???

About

We started working on Jasper with a vision of what we would love to play, today we are proud and happy about what we created.

After we worked so long on Jasper, it's sometimes hard for us to keep focus on what matters. For us this is not just a game we love to play anymore but a passion project that we poured our heart into and at this point we constantly get lost in little details.

So for the next step we are moving to a community-driven approach. We need to continue work on this openly and with your opinions, wishes and criticism!

If you are into games that are fully about immersing yourself into mystical worlds, cultures and heartwarming stories, please join us on this journey. Jasper is our framework to build a world about love, kindness and slowing down.

Join us on the Weasel Club Discord to discuss with us about the City of Myr that is hidden within the Whispering Forest.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
